EmailTemplate.subject: Is your LAN a chain to your past? Meet the LAN of your future.
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Bring your LAN up to light speed Most local area networks currently rely on technology that is 30 years old. They’re struggling to keep up with today’s demands, let alone support the future growth of your organization. But a new solution called Passive Optical LAN can. Learn about the limitations and the fast-approaching end-of-life of your current LAN. Then discover how Passive Optical LAN can support your organization long into the future. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
